mapper.select: select user_id as userId, password, user_name as userName, email, phone_number as phoneNumber, nickname, role from users where user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into users (user_id, password, user_name, email, phone_number, nickname, role) values (#{userId}, #{password}, #{userName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickname}, #{role})
